EmailTemplate.name: TSE: VMworld 2018.004 Tradeshow Template - Follow Up 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for visiting us last week at VMworld in Las Vegas! It was a great week of networking and learning.
To discover more about how we can help you to assure application performance, enforce business policies, and drive dramatic cost efficiencies with Turbonomic’s AI-driven workload automation platform please visit our Resource Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/]]>.
If you’d like to learn more about how Turbonomic can help you and your organization, please schedule a meeting <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> with us.
Best, Kristen
